text: David Stuart English, CBE (4 March 1946 â€“ 12 November 2022) was a British charity fundraiser, actor, writer. He was also the former president of RSO Records. Much of his charitable work was based on the fictional Bunbury Cricket Club. He was appointed MBE in the 2003 Birthday Honours, and CBE in the 2010 Birthday Honours for services to cricket and charity. ==Autobiographies== English wrote two autobiographies; * * ==References== ==Other websites== * *Oil painting of English by Bingham Brothers Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:English writers
title: David English
